T02TD2677E:142a-1: shr'i bh'u ta da ma ra mandala la bi dhi n'a ma /
T02TD2677E:142a-3: dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD2677E:142b-0: dpal @142b 'byung po 'dul byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2677E:142b-1: cho ga'i dbye ba'i rang bzhin dri med grub pa ster ba mi rnams bsgral ba'i don du stong nyid don rtogs blo bzang skyong ba bdag gis bshad /
T02TD2677E:142b-2: 'di ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas sam /
T02TD2677E:142b-5: zla ba gcig gi nang du bsnyen pa byas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:142b-6: de yang ji ltar 'chad pa'i rim pas so //
T02TD2677E:142b-7: de yang mi'i rus pa btags pas bgegs bsal ba'i sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2677E:142b-8: slob ma'i don du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba /
T02TD2677E:142b-9: nyes pa 'joms pa'i sngags brjod la /
T02TD2677E:142b-10: phyogs bcu'i bgegs la phur pas btab ste /
T02TD2677E:142b-12: bus mo'i bar du brkos la /
T02TD2677E:142b-13: yang na brla'am rked pa'i bar du brkos pa ni /
T02TD2677E:142b-14: mchog dang bar dang tha ma'i grub pa ster ro //
T02TD2677E:142b-15: skra la sogs pa'i nyes pa thams cad bsal la /
T02TD2677E:142b-16: dri bzang po'i chus gtor te dag par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:142b-17: nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2677E:142b-18: yang na sa gzhan gyis dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:142b-21: 'bru lnga yang gzhug cing mnyam par bya sa la /
T02TD2677E:142b-22: dri zhim po'i chus byug go //
T02TD2677E:142b-23: de ltar sa la brtag pa la ni /
T02TD2677E:142b-24: zha la dang bcas pa'i gtsug lag khang rnying pa mchog yin la /
T02TD2677E:142b-25: bye ma dang yungs kar dang chu dang bcas pa la lan bdun bsngags te dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi la gtor bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:142b-28: sngon gyi sman rnams kyis kyang byug par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:142b-29: sa dag par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2677E:142b-30: de nas yi ge bam yongs su rdzogs pa las /
T02TD2677E:142b-31: gter gyi bum pa thogs pa'i sa'i lha mo de yang sku phyed thon pa la bstod cing mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2677E:142b-32: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2677E:142b-33: dbang du gyur pa'i lha mo khyod //
T02TD2677E:142b-34: sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang /
T02TD2677E:142b-35: spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par gyi //
T02TD2677E:142b-36: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02TD2677E:142b-37: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02TD2677E:142b-38: de tshe khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02TD2677E:142b-39: de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las //
T02TD2677E:142b-40: rgyal bar byas la dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2677E:142b-41: 'dir ni mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgyas bstod pa byas la /
T02TD2677E:142b-42: me tog la sogs lngas mchod de /
T02TD2677E:142b-43: mchod yon la sogs pa yang byin la /
T02TD2677E:143a-1: rjes su lha mo yang dkyil 'khor la thim par bsam zhing /
T02TD2677E:143a-2: de nas me tog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la lag pa reg la /
T02TD2677E:143a-3: h'um nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pas bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2677E:143a-4: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su slob dpon 'dug la /
T02TD2677E:143a-5: bdag nyid dga' ba bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:143a-6: deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yong //
T02TD2677E:143a-7: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2677E:143a-8: byang chub sems dang bdag ldan no //
T02TD2677E:143a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang //
T02TD2677E:143a-10: bdag kyang da ni ldan par 'gyur //
T02TD2677E:143a-11: de ring rdo rje'i rigs su skyes //
T02TD2677E:143a-12: de ring bdag ni gces pa'i mchog / mchod sbyin mchog gi 'bras bu bdag / lus kyi mchog tu bdag gyur to //
T02TD2677E:143a-13: de nas rang gi lag tu spos thogs te //
T02TD2677E:143a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la /
T02TD2677E:143a-15: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su dgongs par bsams te /
T02TD2677E:143a-16: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus pa //
T02TD2677E:143a-17: deng du bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2677E:143a-18: che ge zhes bya'i rdor 'dzin bdag / dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar 'tshal //
T02TD2677E:143a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir byon cig / rdzes su brtse bar nyer dgongs te //
T02TD2677E:143a-20: dngos grub dam pa stsal du gsol //
T02TD2677E:143a-21: de skad ces brjod la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
T02TD2677E:143a-22: 'od zer 'phros cing bsdus pa las bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:143a-23: de nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2677E:143a-24: phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:143a-25: de nas las kyi rdo rje slob dpon shar phyogs su 'dug la ;
T02TD2677E:143a-26: lho phyogs kyis dang por byas pa'i lan gsum bskor te /
T02TD2677E:143a-27: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la /
T02TD2677E:143a-28: dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis shar phyogs nas dkyil 'khor zhu bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:143a-29: phyogs gzhan nas kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2677E:143a-30: de nas slob ma byang chub sems dpas brjod par bya /
T02TD2677E:143a-31: 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD2677E:143a-32: chos kyi rgyal po chen po khyed //
T02TD2677E:143a-33: 'byung po kun dang klu rnams dang //
T02TD2677E:143a-35: bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms mdzad pa //
T02TD2677E:143a-36: sdug bsngal nyon mongs thams cad 'joms //
T02TD2677E:143b-0: gza' rnams kun @143b dang ro longs dang //
T02TD2677E:143b-1: yi dags dang ni bdung rnams 'joms //
T02TD2677E:143b-2: grub pa thams cad ster mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2677E:143b-3: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2677E:143b-4: de nas las kyi rdo rje slob dpon langs la /
T02TD2677E:143b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsams la /
T02TD2677E:143b-7: bdag ni legs mdzad rdo rje che //
T02TD2677E:143b-8: bdag ni rdo rje stobs po che /
T02TD2677E:143b-9: bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal //
T02TD2677E:143b-10: phyag na rdo rje brtan par gnas //
T02TD2677E:143b-11: bdag ni dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02TD2677E:143b-12: byin gyis brlabs pa mi gtod do //
T02TD2677E:143b-13: de nas rdo rje slob dpon tshig gsum gyis rnyed pa dang ldan pas ;
T02TD2677E:143b-14: rang nyid kyi phyag rgya rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la /
T02TD2677E:143b-15: rdo rje dri la bu gzung bar bya //
T02TD2677E:143b-16: dkyil 'khor las rnams thams cad la //
T02TD2677E:143b-17: 'di nyid bzung nas bya ba yin //
T02TD2677E:143b-20: dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bltas la //
T02TD2677E:143b-21: rang nyid langs la khro bo'i lta bas /
T02TD2677E:143b-22: yi ge hi las skyes pa'i mig gnyis lta bas bgegs thams cad bsregs te /
T02TD2677E:143b-23: de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2677E:143b-24: phyogs thams cad du blta zhing 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:143b-25: rang nyid lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
T02TD2677E:143b-27: yi ge aa yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD2677E:143b-28: sna tshogs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'od zer gyis sa gzhi thams cad khengs par bsam zhing rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bcag par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:143b-29: shar la sogs pa'i bgegs rnams dang /
T02TD2677E:143b-30: phyogs kyi yang phur bus btab la //
T02TD2677E:143b-31: rdo rje'i ra ba dang gur bsams te //
T02TD2677E:143b-32: dpal rdo rje sems dpal dang sbyor bas /
T02TD2677E:143b-33: ko skos aol mdud pa mnan la //
T02TD2677E:143b-34: g-yon nga rgyal du blta bas dpal //
T02TD2677E:143b-35: phyogs brgyad 'khor lor gnas pa dang //
T02TD2677E:143b-36: steng dang 'og kyang byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2677E:143b-37: bh'ur bh'u ba pa tsam bandha ya ta //
T02TD2677E:143b-38: sngags kyi rgyal po h'um brjod pas ;
T02TD2677E:143b-39: / nyes pa kun gyis tshugs ma yin //
T02TD2677E:143b-40: de nas aom badzra mandala h'um dza /
T02TD2677E:143b-41: 'di yis rdo rje khu tshur gnyis brkyang la /
T02TD2677E:143b-42: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:143b-44: rdo rje dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:144a-2: de nas rdo rje bskor ba'i phyag rgya byas te brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:144a-3: de nas seng ldeng gi phur ba la bzlas pa byas te /
T02TD2677E:144a-10: 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2677E:144a-15: de dag kyang sku smad phur pa'i dpal dang ldan pa /
T02TD2677E:144a-16: tsandan dmar po'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD2677E:144a-17: skud pa dmar po dkris te /
T02TD2677E:144a-18: me tog dmar pos brgyan te /
T02TD2677E:144a-19: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi zur dang /
T02TD2677E:144a-20: phyogs rnams su lag pa g-yon pas bzung ste /
T02TD2677E:144a-21: g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pas brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:144a-22: log 'dren gyi mtshams la sogs pa ru /
T02TD2677E:144a-23: sngags 'dis phur bu brdeg par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:144a-24: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bighn'an bandha bandha h'um phat /
T02TD2677E:144a-25: 'dir de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi khu tshur gyis go bgo ste /
T02TD2677E:144a-27: dkyil 'khor gyi sgor nyes pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod la /
T02TD2677E:144a-28: bum pa lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:144a-29: dri bzang po dang bcas pa'i chu blugs te /
T02TD2677E:144a-30: lha thams cad kyi ming dang bcas pa nam mkha' la gnas pa /
T02TD2677E:144a-31: snying po'i 'od zer gyis bkug ste /
T02TD2677E:144a-35: bum pa yang nag po spangs pa mgrin pa ring ba /
T02TD2677E:144a-38: me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i ras zung gis mgul pa dkris /
T02TD2677E:144a-39: 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing gis brgyan pa /
T02TD2677E:144a-41: rigs kyi lha'i mtshan ma dang bcas pa /
T02TD2677E:144a-42: rin po che bdun nam rdza las byas pa'i rnam par rgyal pa'i bum pa'o //
T02TD2677E:144a-43: de yang nang du byu ru dang /
T02TD2677E:144a-44: gser dang dung dang mu tig dang /
T02TD2677E:144a-45: padma r'a ga'i rin po che rnams kyis nang du bcug la gzhan yang sman bri ha ti dang /
T02TD2677E:144a-49: aa pa r'a dzi ta dkar po dang /
T02TD2677E:144b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi @144b sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2677E:144b-2: zhabs bsil dang bcas mchod cing bstod de /
T02TD2677E:144b-3: yi ge h'um brjod pa las /
T02TD2677E:144b-4: bcom ldan 'das yongs su rdzogs pa'i skur bltas la rab tu mchod de /
T02TD2677E:144b-5: bgegs rnams 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2677E:144b-6: phreng pa'am ma brgyus pa'i me tog gam /
T02TD2677E:144b-8: de nas yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags kyis yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02TD2677E:144b-10: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:144b-11: thun gsum du yang dag par mchod cing /
T02TD2677E:144b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bum pa gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:144b-13: 'di ni bum pa rab tu gnas par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2677E:144b-14: de nas brgya byin la sogs pa shar la sogs pa'i phyogs nas rang rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs la /
T02TD2677E:144b-15: mchod yon la sogs pa phul te /
T02TD2677E:144b-16: me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2677E:144b-18: de la sogs pas gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD2677E:144b-19: steng nas kyang zla ba dang /
T02TD2677E:144b-22: mig gyen du bltas te gshegs /
T02TD2677E:144b-23: 'og tu yang aa su re bhya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2677E:144b-25: so sor yang rdo rje'i sor mo gyen du phye nas /
T02TD2677E:144b-26: rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas gtor ma byin la /
T02TD2677E:144b-29: me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas brgyan pa'i gtor ma byin zhing lha rnams spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:144b-30: de nas ras dkar pos bum pa rnams g-yogs te /
T02TD2677E:144b-31: lha rnams kha sbyor dang ldan pa 'byung po dang bcas pa la /
T02TD2677E:144b-32: ye ta ya te ma h'a bh'a to ro tra sth'a na pra munytsa tu sv'a h'a /
T02TD2677E:144b-33: de nas sngags de nyid kyis lha bshos la sogs pa dbul te /
T02TD2677E:144b-34: so sor 'byung po chen po rnams /
T02TD2677E:144b-35: rang rang gnas su ci bder gshegs par bya'o//
T02TD2677E:144b-36: dur khrod chen po lha yi gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2677E:144b-37: shing gcig dang ni chu bo'i gnas rnams dang /
T02TD2677E:144b-38: lam gyi bzhi mdo ling+ga gcig pa dang //
T02TD2677E:144b-39: lha'i gnas rnams su myur du gshegs byas la //
T02TD2677E:144b-40: dam tshig gnas la rab tu gnas par mdzod //
T02TD2677E:144b-41: ji ltar khyed ni mi 'gro na //
T02TD2677E:145a-2: yud tsam gyis ni nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD2677E:145a-3: dmyal pa chen por 'jug par byed //
T02TD2677E:145a-4: ji lta ji ltar ci bde bar //
T02TD2677E:145a-5: rang gi gnas su bde bar song //
T02TD2677E:145a-6: yang mchod yon la sogs ba byin la /
T02TD2677E:145a-7: mchod de ci bde bar gshegs par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:145a-12: de dag tu myur du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2677E:145a-14: dam tshig la rab tu brtan par dam tshig rnams rab tu skyong zhing /
T02TD2677E:145a-15: khro bo chen po'i bka' stsal ji ltar mnos pas /
T02TD2677E:145a-16: rang rang gi las rnams byed par 'gyur te /
T02TD2677E:145a-17: ru tra sth'a na pra muntsan tu sv'a h'a /
T02TD2677E:145a-19: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'i a'a dya nu tpanna tv'ata /
T02TD2677E:145a-20: 'di ni dbyangs chen po'i 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:145a-21: mchod yon la sogs pa sbyin pa 'di ni gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2677E:145a-23: rgyas pa la nyes pa rnams 'joms par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2677E:145a-25: sngags brgya phrag brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2677E:145a-28: slob ma lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:145a-29: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i mgo la me tog bzhag ste /
T02TD2677E:145a-30: slob mas lag par me tog thogs te /
T02TD2677E:145a-32: bdag gis ston pa dga' chen po //
T02TD2677E:145a-33: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2677E:145a-34: byang chub sems mgon brtan pa po //
T02TD2677E:145a-35: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD2677E:145a-36: bdag la byang chub sems kyang stsol //
T02TD2677E:145a-37: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2677E:145a-38: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2677E:145a-39: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2677E:145a-41: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor slob ma bzhag la /
T02TD2677E:145a-42: snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ;
T02TD2677E:145a-43: de'i steng du yi ge h'um las dam las bskyed pa'i rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2677E:145a-44: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung la /
T02TD2677E:145a-45: slob ma'i snying gar de reg cing /
T02TD2677E:145a-46: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho //
T02TD2677E:145a-47: badzra sidhya ya tha su kham /
T02TD2677E:145a-48: sa 'dir slob dpon gyis sdig pa bshags pa bya ba'i don du /
T02TD2677E:145b-0: phyag @145b 'tshal bde gshegs thams cad la //
T02TD2677E:145b-1: ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa po //
T02TD2677E:145b-2: /'khor ba kun gyi skyabs mdzod cig / bdag ni nye bar skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2677E:145b-3: gtso bo kun du bsgom par bgyi //
T02TD2677E:145b-4: sdug bsngal gsum las grol ba'i phyir //
T02TD2677E:145b-5: 'jig rten sdug bsngal bdag gis mthong//
T02TD2677E:145b-6: thams cad byed par gnas pa yi //
T02TD2677E:145b-7: sdug bsngal gsum gyis thams cad gdung //
T02TD2677E:145b-8: bdag ni khyed la dbul bar bgyi //
T02TD2677E:145b-9: bdag ni khyed kyis bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2677E:145b-10: sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02TD2677E:145b-11: phyin chad sdig pa bdag mi bgyid //
T02TD2677E:145b-12: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rangs//
T02TD2677E:145b-13: byas dang byed bcug dge ba la //
T02TD2677E:145b-14: bdag ni de bzhin mngon par dga' //
T02TD2677E:145b-15: chos gsung mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD2677E:145b-16: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2677E:145b-17: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2677E:145b-18: mchog tu rtsol pa chen po yis //
T02TD2677E:145b-19: bdag ni sangs rgyas 'gyur par shog /
T02TD2677E:145b-20: sangs rgyas dbang phyug gnas pa yis //
T02TD2677E:145b-21: 'khor ba thams cad bsgral don du //
T02TD2677E:145b-22: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mthar phyin te //
T02TD2677E:145b-23: sangs rgyas rgyu la bkod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2677E:145b-24: ji ltar bzod pa'i stobs rnams kyis //
T02TD2677E:145b-25: smon lam chen po gdab par bgyi //
T02TD2677E:145b-26: de ltar gyur pa'i stobs kyis su //
T02TD2677E:145b-27: 'di ltar rigs dang rigs skyes kyang //
T02TD2677E:145b-28: thabs kyis 'gro ba bsgral bar gyi //
T02TD2677E:145b-29: thams cad mnyam pa'i go 'phang ba //
T02TD2677E:145b-30: dri med stong pa'i yon tan can //
T02TD2677E:145b-31: rigs las byas pa'i bsod nams kyis //
T02TD2677E:145b-32: byas dang byed du bcug pa yi //
T02TD2677E:145b-33: bdag gi bsod nams ci mchis pas //
T02TD2677E:145b-34: grub cing bde ba'i gnas phyin shog / de nas rin chen dpal mos lag pa na dri thogs pa /
T02TD2677E:145b-36: thig le mchog mas bdug spos dang /
T02TD2677E:145b-37: ri bong 'dzin mas mar me thogs pa rnams kyis mchod la /
T02TD2677E:145b-41: byang chub kyi shing las byas pa'i so shing /
T02TD2677E:145b-42: dri dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02TD2677E:145b-43: so 'brud pa'i tshul gyis bzung la //
T02TD2677E:145b-45: rdo rje chos kyis bzlas pa'i dri bzang po'i mchod yon gyis chus kha bshal byin la /
T02TD2677E:146a-0: aom hr'i:bi shuddha dharma sarba p'a pa ni shtsa @146a * //
T02TD2677E:146a-1: sya sarba bi kalp'an aa pa na ya h'um /
T02TD2677E:146a-2: rdo rje rnon po chen po 'di //
T02TD2677E:146a-3: yongs su rdzogs shing ma nyams pa //
T02TD2677E:146a-4: gcig nim go bog zhan ni bstan //
T02TD2677E:146a-6: bzlas ba sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:146a-7: sngags dang stan du byin la /
T02TD2677E:146a-9: skud pa sum sgril rang gi slob ma'i dpung pa g-yon pa la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:146a-10: de yang yi ge drug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2677E:146a-12: slob ma la chos bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:146a-13: de ring khyod ni dga' ba yin //
T02TD2677E:146a-14: rnyed pa chen po khyed kyis rnyed //
T02TD2677E:146a-15: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2677E:146a-16: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa khyod //
T02TD2677E:146a-17: sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes su bzung //
T02TD2677E:146a-18: bdag nyid chen po rgyal ba'i sras //
T02TD2677E:146a-19: khyod ni theg pa chen po la //
T02TD2677E:146a-20: dga' ba'i rigs can thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2677E:146a-21: 'di ni lam gyi mchog yin te //
T02TD2677E:146a-22: dpal dang ldan pa'i theg pa che //
T02TD2677E:146a-23: lam 'di la ni khyod phyin na //
T02TD2677E:146a-24: de bzhin gshegs par khyod 'gyur ro //
T02TD2677E:146a-25: rang byung skal ba che dang ldan /
T02TD2677E:146a-27: yod dang med pa'i de nyid spangs //
T02TD2677E:146a-28: nam mkha' lar du dri ma med //
T02TD2677E:146a-29: zab mo rtog ge'i yul las 'das //
T02TD2677E:146a-30: rtog dpyod yul las 'das pa po //
T02TD2677E:146a-31: thams cad lnga ru gnas pas te //
T02TD2677E:146a-32: lnga pa kun kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2677E:146a-33: las dang spyod par gnas pa kun //
T02TD2677E:146a-34: gnyis med bden pa'i dpal dang ldan //
T02TD2677E:146a-35: 'di ni theg pa chen po'i mchog /'di 'dra khyod kyis thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2677E:146a-36: de skad ces slob ma la brjod par byas la slob ma rnams bstan par bya ste ;
T02TD2677E:146a-37: rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' drin gyis khyed kyis nang par grol ba'i grong khyer chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2677E:146a-38: bdug pa la sogs pa ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa rnams shoms shig / bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa /
T02TD2677E:146a-39: bcom ldan 'das che ge mo reg pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD2677E:146a-40: dkyil 'khor snying rje chen po bdag / nang par bdag ni 'dri bar 'dod //
T02TD2677E:146a-41: slob ma rjes su gzung phyir dang //
T02TD2677E:146a-42: khyed rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2677E:146a-43: 'di ltar bdag ni gus pa la //
T02TD2677E:146b-0: bdag @146b ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la //
T02TD2677E:146b-1: che ge dkyil 'khor ces pa'i mchog / nang par sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2677E:146b-2: ji lar 'byor pa'i stobs kyis so //
T02TD2677E:146b-3: rjes su bzung ba'i thabs kyis ni //
T02TD2677E:146b-4: bdag gi slob ma gang yin la //
T02TD2677E:146b-5: dkyil 'khor lha sogs dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2677E:146b-6: de skad ces lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD2677E:146b-7: de nas dkyil 'khor legs par mchod la /
T02TD2677E:146b-8: mchod yon la sogs pa yang phul te /
T02TD2677E:146b-9: las kyi rdo rjes slob ma dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su nyal la 'dug par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:146b-10: gzhan nyi ma la lha'i rnal 'byor byas la //
T02TD2677E:146b-11: dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bltas te ;
T02TD2677E:146b-17: don grub btags pas kyang byug ste /
T02TD2677E:146b-18: de ltar skud pa lnga rnams so sor bzhag ste /
T02TD2677E:146b-20: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su bsams la ;
T02TD2677E:146b-21: de dag kyang rang rang gi gnas su byin gyis brlab cing sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pa dang /
T02TD2677E:146b-22: rang gi snying ga las kyang 'od zer 'phros te /
T02TD2677E:146b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:146b-24: aom d'apti drishti aam ku sha dza /
T02TD2677E:146b-25: 'di ni mig lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02TD2677E:146b-26: mig phyogs thams cad du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:146b-27: gzi ma brtags te mig rab tu bgrad pas /
T02TD2677E:146b-28: srad bu nam mkha' la brkyang ba la blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:146b-29: chos rnams thams cad rjes su gcig pa la //
T02TD2677E:146b-30: spro zhing bsdus pas rjes su brtan par byas //
T02TD2677E:146b-31: chos rnams thams cad de nyid gcig pa yin //
T02TD2677E:146b-32: h'um zhes brjod la gcig tu bsgril lo //
T02TD2677E:146b-33: de nas gser la sogs pa'i snod du bzhag cing mchod la /
T02TD2677E:146b-34: rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgya bcas la //
T02TD2677E:146b-36: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD2677E:146b-37: 'di ni lan brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod la //
T02TD2677E:146b-38: de nas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi la ;
T02TD2677E:146b-39: nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams rab tu brtan pa la /
T02TD2677E:146b-40: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2677E:146b-41: mig gnyis su yi ge dza: yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD2677E:146b-42: zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bltas la /
T02TD2677E:146b-43: byang phyogs kyi sgrub pa pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs kyis /
T02TD2677E:147a-0: @147a * // g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis skud pa lte bar bzung ste /
T02TD2677E:147a-1: aom:dza:dza:dza: de skad ces brjod pas /
T02TD2677E:147a-2: byang phyogs kyi sgrub pa pos kyang /
T02TD2677E:147a-4: aom:dza:dza:dza: zhes brjod cing slob dpon gyi lag tu gtad do //
T02TD2677E:147a-5: de ltar slob dpon dang slob ma gdong phyogs pas /
T02TD2677E:147a-6: nub dang lho yang slob dpon gyi gnas yin /
T02TD2677E:147a-7: shar dang byang na slob dpon gyi gnas so //
T02TD2677E:147a-8: de skad ces nam mkha' la thig btab la /
T02TD2677E:147a-9: sems kyis phyogs dang mtshams thams cad kyi phyogs mnyam par bgos te /
T02TD2677E:147a-10: de nyid kyi rim pas sa gzhi la tshangs pa'i thig la sogs pa gdab ste /
T02TD2677E:147a-11: thig skud sboms su dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i nyi shu cha /
T02TD2677E:147a-13: de yang rdo rje khu tshur gyis skud pa shar phyogs su bzung la //
T02TD2677E:147a-19: dbang phyug dang bden bral gyi phyogs su gdong blta zhing ;
T02TD2677E:147a-20: me dang rlung dang ni slob dpon gyi gnas yin la /
T02TD2677E:147a-21: shar dang nub dang byang dang phyogs bzhir mnyam par thig btab la /
T02TD2677E:147a-22: de yang cha brgyad du mnyam par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:147a-23: de yang skud pa'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs shing dgongs par bsam mo //
T02TD2677E:147a-24: de yang slob dpon slob ma'i g-yas su skor zhing 'gro bar bya ste /
T02TD2677E:147a-25: me dang rlung ni rtag tu slob dpon gyi gnas yin /
T02TD2677E:147a-26: srin po dang dbang ldan rnams su yang zur gyi thig rnams gdab bo //
T02TD2677E:147a-27: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2677E:147a-28: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2677E:147a-29: cha rnams bcu drug dang ldan zhing //
T02TD2677E:147a-30: rdo rjer bas kun nas bskor ;
T02TD2677E:147a-31: / de ltar du ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD2677E:147a-32: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas bzhi ste /
T02TD2677E:147a-33: snying po'i lte ba dang re'u mig brgyad dang ldan pa /
T02TD2677E:147a-34: phyi rol nas rdo rje ra bas kun nas bskor ba //
T02TD2677E:147a-35: gnyis gnyis dang ldan pa'i cha gsum dang //
T02TD2677E:147a-36: thams cad kyi dbus su brgyad cha'i sgo tshad dang /
T02TD2677E:147a-37: sgo'i phyed kyis sgo khyud dang /
T02TD2677E:147a-40: 'gram pa'i phyed kyir dul tshon gyi sa dang /
T02TD2677E:147a-42: mchod pa'i snam bu'i tshad kyis dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i sa'o //
T02TD2677E:147a-43: rdo rje'i ka ba brgyad kyis ni rdul tshon gyis yin la /
T02TD2677E:147b-0: sgo'i sum 'gyur @147b gyis rta babs so //
T02TD2677E:147b-1: phyogs kyi gnas dang snying po'i gnas de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:147b-7: de nas dkyil 'khor lte bar phur pa btab la /
T02TD2677E:147b-8: phyi rol nas kun nas bskor bar bya sre /
T02TD2677E:147b-10: de bzhin ri mo gnyis kyis bskor /
T02TD2677E:147b-14: 'khor lo gru bzhi mnyam pa la bskor ba bya /
T02TD2677E:147b-16: cha bcu drug dang ldan pa /
T02TD2677E:147b-17: gnas brgyad zlum por bskor te /
T02TD2677E:147b-18: rdo rje phreng bas kun nas bskor ba /
T02TD2677E:147b-19: thams cad kyang sngon du bshad pa'i mdog dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2677E:147b-20: de nas yi ge hi las /
T02TD2677E:147b-22: g-yon pa gnyis zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du byas la /
T02TD2677E:147b-24: ye shes kyi thig gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD2677E:147b-25: de nas bam lam ram ham dzam gi sa bon las /
T02TD2677E:147b-26: rim pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2677E:147b-27: skud pa'i kha dog bzhin du dkar po la sogs pa rnams kyang byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:147b-30: ba bla la sogs pa'i khams gzhan nam /
T02TD2677E:147b-31: 'bras mkhar ba la sogs pa'i 'bru rnams kyis kyang rung ste /
T02TD2677E:147b-32: yang na so phag la sogs pa'i sa rnams kyis kyang bya'o //
T02TD2677E:147b-34: sa bon 'di dag yongs su rdzogs pa las /
T02TD2677E:147b-35: rang rang gi kha dog gi rigs bzhin du byin gyis brlab bar bya ste /
T02TD2677E:147b-36: aom badzra ti tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2677E:147b-37: de bzhin du rdul tshon rnams la /
T02TD2677E:147b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs te bstims la /
T02TD2677E:147b-40: yi ge hr'i:las gzi brjid dang ldan zhing /
T02TD2677E:147b-41: rdo rje khro bo nyi ma'i lta bas ba ltas la /
T02TD2677E:147b-43: yi ge aa brjod cing sngags dang phyag rgya bcas te /
T02TD2677E:147b-44: rdul tshon rnams rab tu 'bar bar bsam mo //
T02TD2677E:147b-45: rdo rje khu tshur bas la /
T02TD2677E:147b-46: snying ga'i h'um las 'od zer dri ma med pa 'phros te 'bar bar bsam zhing /
T02TD2677E:147b-47: s'urya dzva la mandala h'um phat /
T02TD2677E:147b-48: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la btab pa'i phur pa yi ge h'um brjod cing /
T02TD2677E:148a-0: rang gi rdo rje dang bcas @148a * //
T02TD2677E:148a-2: phug pa'i khung bu yang rdul tshon lngas dgang ngo //
T02TD2677E:148a-3: rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la /
T02TD2677E:148a-5: dga' ba dang ldan pas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148a-6: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02TD2677E:148a-7: sems can khams ni grol bar byed //
T02TD2677E:148a-8: bdag ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal //
T02TD2677E:148a-9: rdul tshon sa gzhir bkod par bya //
T02TD2677E:148a-10: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis log 'dren gyi phyogs nas /
T02TD2677E:148a-11: ji ltar bde bar dul tshon dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148a-12: de yang mnyam par srab mthug med par g-yas su bskor zhing dkar po dang /
T02TD2677E:148a-16: sngon po rnams rim pas sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148a-21: kha dog gsum sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148a-23: nag po 'ba' zhig gis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148a-24: de dag kyang sbom phra sgo'i tshad tsam gyi ri mo bcad cing nas kyi tshad tsam du sbom par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148a-25: de yang shar phyogs dkar po //
T02TD2677E:148a-28: lus ngan po'i phyogs ljang gu /
T02TD2677E:148a-31: bgegs kyi mtshan ma dang ldan na /
T02TD2677E:148a-32: bgegs 'joms par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2677E:148a-33: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas bgags bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148a-35: yi ge ham las glang po che'i gdan de'i steng du yi ge aom las padma dang nyi ma'i gdan /
T02TD2677E:148a-36: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rang gi bzhugs stangs dang kha dog gis gnas pa la /
T02TD2677E:148a-37: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2677E:148a-38: yi ge h'um brjod cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la bstim par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148a-39: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2677E:148a-40: dbang phyug chen po rang gi kha dog dang gdan dang bzhugs thabs mngon rtogs sgrub thabs las bshad pa bzhin du ;
T02TD2677E:148a-41: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes brjod la /
T02TD2677E:148a-42: bcom ldan 'das kyi shar phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148a-43: 'khor lo thams cad dgug pa dang //
T02TD2677E:148a-45: bstim zhing yi ge h'um gis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2677E:148a-46: ji ltar gshegs su gsol ba'i tshe //
T02TD2677E:148b-0: lag pa rdo rje dang ldan @148b pas thig rnams steng du bteg ste /
T02TD2677E:148b-2: de nas sngon du bshad pa'i bum pa dri bzang po'i chus bkang ba me tog gis brgyan te /
T02TD2677E:148b-3: brgyad dbang lnga la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs dang mtshams dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148b-4: de nas rdo rje slob dpon khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas /
T02TD2677E:148b-5: gos sngon po bgos te me tog sngon po'i phreng bas bcings la /
T02TD2677E:148b-6: dril bu dkrol zhing bskor ba lan gsum bya ste /
T02TD2677E:148b-7: me tog sngon pos mchod la /
T02TD2677E:148b-8: dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su song la gar bya zhing /
T02TD2677E:148b-9: me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2677E:148b-10: gar bya zhing mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2677E:148b-12: brjod gha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
T02TD2677E:148b-13: rang nyid khro bo chen po'i nga rgyal gyis shar sgo nas song ste /
T02TD2677E:148b-15: lho dang byang gi yang sgor phyin te /
T02TD2677E:148b-16: de nas rol pa'i gar gyis /
T02TD2677E:148b-17: shar gyi sgor bum pa'i phyi rol tu phyin la /
T02TD2677E:148b-18: me tog gi gcal bkram ste /
T02TD2677E:148b-21: sngags 'di brjod cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya bca'o //
T02TD2677E:148b-22: me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2677E:148b-23: yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148b-24: de nas dkyil 'khor la lan gsum bskor te /
T02TD2677E:148b-25: bskor ba gsum byas la dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i mdun du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148b-26: yang bum pa gnyis pa blangs la /
T02TD2677E:148b-27: brgya phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148b-28: bum pa gnyis pa'i chus bdag nyid dang slob ma'i mgo la gtor bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148b-29: khro bo chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcing zhing bstims la /
T02TD2677E:148b-30: dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan ma can gyi bu pa la sogs pa blangs te /
T02TD2677E:148b-31: rang rang gi sngags kyis brgya phrag brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD2677E:148b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol rang rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:148b-34: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2677E:148b-39: me lha rnams la bum pa gcig go //
T02TD2677E:148b-42: rin chen dpal mo chen mo dang /
T02TD2677E:149a-2: bum pa bcu las nyung ba ni ma yin la /
T02TD2677E:149a-3: bum pa bcu rnam par gang bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2677E:149a-4: de ltar dkyil 'khor de mngon sum du gnas pa la mchod cing /
T02TD2677E:149a-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra banda n'am ka ro m'i ti pra na ma /
T02TD2677E:149a-6: sngon du bshad pa'i skyabs dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bya zhing sdom pa yang gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:149a-7: byang chub sems ni bskyed bar bgyi //
T02TD2677E:149a-8: sems can ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir /
T02TD2677E:149a-9: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2677E:149a-10: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa//
T02TD2677E:149a-11: tshul khrims sdom pa rnam pa gsum //
T02TD2677E:149a-12: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2677E:149a-13: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2677E:149a-14: bdag gis kyang ni brtan par gzung //
T02TD2677E:149a-15: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2677E:149a-16: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2677E:149a-17: mchog tu gus pas gzung bar bgyi ;
T02TD2677E:149a-18: / sdom pa sangs rgyas rnal 'byor can //
T02TD2677E:149a-19: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2677E:149a-20: bdag gis de nyid gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2677E:149a-21: rdo rje chen po'i rigs dag la //
T02TD2677E:149a-22: sbyin pa rnam bzhi so sor sbyin //
T02TD2677E:149a-23: nyin re bzhin la'ang dus drug tu //
T02TD2677E:149a-24: rin chen chen po'i rigs mchog sbyor //
T02TD2677E:149a-25: ting 'dzin rab tu dga' ba yis //
T02TD2677E:149a-26: chos rnams thams cad gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2677E:149a-27: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD2677E:149a-28: padma chen po'i rigs dag pa //
T02TD2677E:149a-29: byang chub chen po'i rigs byung ba //
T02TD2677E:149a-30: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2677E:149a-31: de nyid bdag gis gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2677E:149a-32: mchod pa'i las rnams ci 'byor pa //
T02TD2677E:149a-33: las kyi rigs ni chen po la //
T02TD2677E:149a-34: mchog tu bskyed par bgyi ba ni //
T02TD2677E:149a-35: byang chub sems ni rjes bsgral ba //
T02TD2677E:149a-36: sdom pa gzung bar bgyi ba ni //
T02TD2677E:149a-37: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2677E:149a-38: ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2677E:149a-39: ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi//
T02TD2677E:149a-40: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD2677E:149a-42: de nas nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2677E:149a-44: h'um bzlas shing gos sngon po gon te /
T02TD2677E:149a-45: phrag pa phud de gtsug tor dang ldan pas /
T02TD2677E:149b-0: me tog gi phreng ba'i do shal @149b la /
T02TD2677E:149b-2: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te /
T02TD2677E:149b-3: sgo srung gi sngags bzlas shing //
T02TD2677E:149b-4: gos sngon pos stod bcings la /
T02TD2677E:149b-5: phyi rul du gnas pa la bum pa'i chus gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:149b-6: khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2677E:149b-7: slob ma la go cha bskon cing srung ba byas la /
T02TD2677E:149b-8: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par byas te /
T02TD2677E:149b-9: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2677E:149b-10: de ma thag tu dngos grub thob //
T02TD2677E:149b-11: khro ba'i rgyal po grub pa'i bdag / dam tshig lha rnams brtan par byed //
T02TD2677E:149b-12: de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2677E:149b-13: badzra kro dha h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD2677E:149b-15: nang du gzhug cing brjod par bya ba ni /
T02TD2677E:149b-16: rdo rje khro bo rang gis dbab pa bya ste /
T02TD2677E:149b-18: de la sogs pa'i sngags kyis rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya bstan par byas te /
T02TD2677E:149b-19: phreng ba bzhag cing gdod pa dkrol la /
T02TD2677E:149b-20: de nas chu'i dbang dam tshig gsum sbyin zhing /
T02TD2677E:149b-21: bcom ldan 'das thams cad slob dpon gyi gzugs kyi gnas par /
T02TD2677E:149b-22: sngon du brjod pa'i rim pas bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:149b-23: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi don du dbang rdzas sbyin zhing /
T02TD2677E:149b-24: tshigs su bcad pa lngas bstod la /
T02TD2677E:149b-25: yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags brjod cing phyag rgya bas te /
T02TD2677E:149b-26: lung bstan pa bzung zhing yang rdo rje'i mchog sbyin par byed pa rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba khyod /
T02TD2677E:149b-27: che ge mo zhes bya ba'i ming gis /
T02TD2677E:149b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya dang sngags bzlas pas /
T02TD2677E:149b-30: ai'i dbang phyug de'i gnas su khro bo'i rdo rje rang gis gzung zhing ;
T02TD2677E:149b-31: khro bo'i nga rgyal byas la /
T02TD2677E:149b-32: de nas rdo rje chen po gzung ngo //
T02TD2677E:149b-33: khro bo'i bdag po chen po'i nga rgyal du gnas pas /
T02TD2677E:149b-34: de nas sngon khro bo'i dbang po 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya bshad pa /
T02TD2677E:149b-35: bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu bstod cing /
T02TD2677E:149b-36: sngon gyi nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags bzlas te /
T02TD2677E:149b-39: ra ba dang gur bsams la /
T02TD2677E:149b-40: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul zhing /
T02TD2677E:149b-42: dza:h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2677E:149b-43: de skad ces sgrub pa pos brjod la /
T02TD2677E:150a-0: de lha chen po la sogs @150a * //
T02TD2677E:150a-1: pa rnams rang rang gi dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:150a-2: sgrub thabs dang phyag rgya dang dbang yongs su rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2677E:150a-3: nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2677E:150a-4: 'dug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing ;
T02TD2677E:150a-6: gos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2677E:150a-7: dpag tu med pa'i ba wang dang /
T02TD2677E:150a-8: rgyal mtshan mang pos mchod cing /
T02TD2677E:150a-11: de nas me tog dang spos dang bdug pa dang mar me dang /
T02TD2677E:150a-12: zhal zas rnams kyis mchod par byas te /
T02TD2677E:150a-15: ji ltar 'byor pa'i dris mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:150a-20: 'di ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2677E:150a-21: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um /
T02TD2677E:150a-23: de dag gis dpag tu med pa'i mtshang pa'i sprin rnams sgros shing /
T02TD2677E:150a-29: btung ba rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:150a-30: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'an'am a'adya nutpanna tv'at /
T02TD2677E:150a-32: ral gri'i phyag rgyas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:150a-33: rdo rje khru tshur gyis sor mo rnams bskul zhing rol mo'i phyag rgyas yi ge h'um brjod cing dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:150a-39: rna rgyan dang cod pan la sogs pa /
T02TD2677E:150a-40: aom brjod cing dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:150a-47: aom sarba bid p'a ra a'a barta a'a brta ho //
T02TD2677E:150a-48: de nas rdo rje sor mo rnams spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD2677E:150a-49: sngon gyi aom brjod cing dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:150a-50: byang phyogs su las kyir do rje slob dpon gnas nas /
T02TD2677E:150a-53: yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags stong phrag gcig bzlas shing /
T02TD2677E:150b-0: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang bzlas par @150b bya'o ;
T02TD2677E:150b-1: / dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su gdong phyogs nas /
T02TD2677E:150b-2: las thams cad pa'i thab tu dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02TD2677E:150b-3: me tog dang mar me rnams yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2677E:150b-4: dbang phyug chen pos gtso byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la sngags bdun bdun gyis dbul lo //
T02TD2677E:150b-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos me tog dang /
T02TD2677E:150b-7: spos la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha la dbul zhing /
T02TD2677E:150b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te /
T02TD2677E:150b-10: bdag ni sdom pa kun dang ldan //
T02TD2677E:150b-11: dam tshig mgon pos rjes su gzung //
T02TD2677E:150b-12: phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa rnams //
T02TD2677E:150b-13: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la //
T02TD2677E:150b-14: dbang por gnas par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2677E:150b-16: sangs rgyas gar mdzad sdom pa la ;
T02TD2677E:150b-17: /'khor lo rab tu bskor bar mdzad //
T02TD2677E:150b-18: rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer du //
T02TD2677E:150b-20: slob dpon chen po khyed kyis ni //
T02TD2677E:150b-21: gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2677E:150b-22: bdag ni skal bar ldan par mdzod //
T02TD2677E:150b-23: dbang bskur chen po stsal du gsol ;
T02TD2677E:150b-24: / slob dpon bdag la sbyin par mdzod //
T02TD2677E:150b-25: mtshan rnams kun dang ldan pa po //
T02TD2677E:150b-26: dbang gi rjes su gzung du gsol //
T02TD2677E:150b-27: sangs rgyas sku bdag yid dga' ba //
T02TD2677E:150b-28: gter mdzod slob dpon chen po khyod //
T02TD2677E:150b-29: dbang bskur chen po stsal du gsol //
T02TD2677E:150b-30: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir ;
T02TD2677E:150b-31: / bdag kyang slob dpon 'gyur bar mdzod //
T02TD2677E:150b-32: de skad du slob dpon la mandala phul te zhu bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:150b-33: bdag ni slob dpon 'di zhes pas //
T02TD2677E:150b-34: byang chub sems kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD2677E:150b-37: de nas slob dpon gyis dri bar bya /
T02TD2677E:150b-38: skyes bu chen po khyod 'dod pa //
T02TD2677E:150b-39: gsang ba'i rigs ni dag pas te //
T02TD2677E:150b-40: dag pa bzhad mdzad zab mo gzung /
T02TD2677E:150b-41: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:150b-42: slob ma bdag ni 'dod do zhes brjod la //
T02TD2677E:151a-0: de nas dpon dam tshig dang sdom pa @151a * //
T02TD2677E:151a-2: ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du bdag gis bgyis te /
T02TD2677E:151a-3: de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2677E:151a-4: 'gro ba dang bstan pa thams cad du //
T02TD2677E:151a-5: yang dbang bskur bar 'dod kyis sdom pa mi bzung ngo zhe na /
T02TD2677E:151a-6: de la dkyil 'khor kyang bstan par mi bya zhing dbab par mi bya'o //
T02TD2677E:151a-7: 'ga' zhig sdom pa dang dam tshig gzung bar 'dod pa la ni /
T02TD2677E:151a-8: slob dpon gyis rjes su bzung zhing //
T02TD2677E:151a-10: de nas nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod de /
T02TD2677E:151a-11: aom sarba yo ga tsitta auta p'a da y'a mi /
T02TD2677E:151a-12: sngags 'di brjod la byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:151a-13: slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje rab tu gnas pa byas la /
T02TD2677E:151a-14: aom su ra ta sa ma ya satvam ho //
T02TD2677E:151a-15: badzra siddhya ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2677E:151a-16: de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur te /
T02TD2677E:151a-17: de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur gyis /
T02TD2677E:151a-18: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste /
T02TD2677E:151a-19: gus pa dang bral ba rnams la yang ma yin no //
T02TD2677E:151a-20: de nas slob mas yon phul la /
T02TD2677E:151a-21: khro bo'i rgyal pos byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:151a-22: de'i rjes su brten par gnas pa la /
T02TD2677E:151a-23: bum pa'i nang nas chu blangs pas gtor zhing mgo thog tu bzhag pas bsrung ste /
T02TD2677E:151a-24: khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas go cha bskon la /
T02TD2677E:151a-25: me tog sngon po'i thod bcing zhing /
T02TD2677E:151a-28: de las gsang ba'i sngags kyis dgug par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:151a-30: ma h'a su ra ta su dri tha du to sv'ah'a /
T02TD2677E:151a-31: badzra sa tv'a aadya si dya m'am /
T02TD2677E:151a-32: yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2677E:151a-33: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2677E:151a-34: de ring rdo rje'i ye shes thob ;
T02TD2677E:151a-35: / ye shes de yis de ring khyod //
T02TD2677E:151a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD2677E:151a-37: dngos grub kyang ni thob 'gyur na //
T02TD2677E:151a-38: grub pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
T02TD2677E:151a-39: dkyil 'khor dam pa khyed kyis mthong //
T02TD2677E:151a-40: ma mthong ba la smra mi bya //
T02TD2677E:151a-41: gal te khyod kyis 'di smras na//
T02TD2677E:151b-0: @151b dam tshig rnam par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2677E:151b-1: dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcas la //
T02TD2677E:151b-2: de skad ces slob ma'i mgo thog tu rdo rje bzhag la smra bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:151b-3: 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02TD2677E:151b-4: khyod kyis gal te 'di smras na //
T02TD2677E:151b-6: de nas dam tshig gi chu sbyin par byas te ;
T02TD2677E:151b-8: slob mas 'thung ba'i dus su 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:151b-9: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2677E:151b-10: khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas //
T02TD2677E:151b-11: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2677E:151b-12: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2677E:151b-14: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu ;
T02TD2677E:151b-15: / dam tshig 'das na rlag par byed /
T02TD2677E:151b-16: dam tshig bsrungs na grub par gyur //
T02TD2677E:151b-17: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung cig / rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD2677E:151b-18: gus pa dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i bsam pa brtags la /
T02TD2677E:151b-19: slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:151b-20: de ring phan ched khyod kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa nga yin te /
T02TD2677E:151b-21: ngas ji skad ces pa de khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02TD2677E:151b-22: de lta ma yin na khyod yid mi bde ba chen po dang bcas nas tshe'i dus byas te /
T02TD2677E:151b-23: dmyal bar 'jug par gyur ta re /
T02TD2677E:151b-24: de nas rang gi snying gar yi ge aa las 'od zer dmar po 'phros pas ;
T02TD2677E:151b-25: sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya bcas te slob ma'i snying ga'i rdo rje la zhugs nas /
T02TD2677E:151b-26: lus thams cad khengs par bsam zhing /
T02TD2677E:151b-27: de nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:151b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis /
T02TD2677E:151b-29: rdo rje khro bo bdag la dbab par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2677E:151b-30: de nas dbab pa'i phyag rgya snying gar bcas la /
T02TD2677E:151b-31: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2677E:151b-33: rdo rje sems dpa' dran par bya //
T02TD2677E:151b-35: rdo rje ye shes rjes su sgrol //
T02TD2677E:151b-36: aom pra be sha badzra kro dha h'um h'um h'um aa /
T02TD2677E:151b-37: ji ltar nam mkha' las khro bo'i dbang pos 'bebs par bsam zhing sngags de brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:151b-38: des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na //
T02TD2677E:151b-39: de nas khro bo dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2677E:151b-40: slob dpon g-yon brkyang bas gnas la /
T02TD2677E:151b-41: rdo rje 'dzin rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su bltas la /
T02TD2677E:152a-0: @152a * // slob ma'i spyi bor gnas par bsams la /
T02TD2677E:152a-1: 'od zer gyis lus gang bar bsam zhing /
T02TD2677E:152a-2: rlung gis rab tu g-yos pa la dmigs pa gtad de /
T02TD2677E:152a-3: h'um gis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:152a-4: rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su gnas pas /
T02TD2677E:152a-7: slob ma'i khar 'jug par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:152a-8: aom pra be sha kro dha h'um h'um h'um aa:dzva l'a ma la ku la ba kha na badzra aa /
T02TD2677E:152a-10: slob ma sdig pa mang po byas pas /
T02TD2677E:152a-11: sdig pa 'dral ba'i phyag rgya bcas la //
T02TD2677E:152a-12: sdig pa gzhom par byas te /
T02TD2677E:152a-13: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa sku mdog dmar po //
T02TD2677E:152a-14: 'od zer dmar po kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor ba bsam par byas la /
T02TD2677E:152a-15: h'um a'a:sngags 'di mang du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:152a-16: des kyang 'bab par ma gyur kyang //
T02TD2677E:152a-17: dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya'o ;
T02TD2677E:152a-18: / de'i tshe 'bab par 'gyur na mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2677E:152a-20: lce la rdo rje bsams la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:152a-23: de ltar byung ba thams cad smros shig ces brjod pas smra bar 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2677E:152a-24: / de nas snying gar rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2677E:152a-25: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba sh'a shva to me bha ba /
T02TD2677E:152a-26: hri da ya me aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho: 'dis ye shes brtan par byas la /
T02TD2677E:152a-27: de nas yi ge tr'am gis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2677E:152a-30: de nas slob ma'i mgo bo la me tog phreng ba bcings shing /
T02TD2677E:152a-31: sems can stobs chen khyod kyis ni //
T02TD2677E:152a-32: 'di nyid yang dag gzung bar bya //
T02TD2677E:152a-33: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol zhing //
T02TD2677E:152a-34: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang //
T02TD2677E:152a-35: khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson /
T02TD2677E:152a-36: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02TD2677E:152a-37: phye bas mchog tu gyur pa yin /
T02TD2677E:152a-39: de nas yi ge aam dang h'um gis mig gnyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2677E:152a-40: padma wa ti'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:152b-0: de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad kyis snying @152b po'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ba sgo rtsig pa kha dog lnga dang ldan pa /
T02TD2677E:152b-1: lte ba la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba /
T02TD2677E:152b-2: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la glang po che'i rgyal po'i steng du 'byung po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i steng na nyes pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bltas la /
T02TD2677E:152b-3: de nas slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i don du slob ma la bkra shis la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2677E:152b-4: bkra shis la sogs pa yang rdo rje 'dzin pas bya ste //
T02TD2677E:152b-5: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2677E:152b-6: sngags kyis gnas drug tu phyin gyis brlabs par byas te /
T02TD2677E:152b-7: rol ba'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa la /
T02TD2677E:152b-8: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'byung po gzhan rnams kyis kyang yi ge h'um gi sgra sgrogs shing /
T02TD2677E:152b-9: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dkar po dang /
T02TD2677E:152b-11: aom bzlas shing kha dog sna tshogs ba'i rgyan dang /
T02TD2677E:152b-13: de dag la sogs pa dpag tu med pa'i tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2677E:152b-14: me tog la sogs pas kyang mchod de /
T02TD2677E:152b-18: de dag la sogs pa'i rol mo dpag tu med pa dang /
T02TD2677E:152b-21: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing /
T02TD2677E:152b-22: bstod pa'i tshogs kyis kyang bstod la /
T02TD2677E:152b-23: sgo skyong gi 'gram nas bum pa blangs la /
T02TD2677E:152b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bum pas spyi bor dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2677E:152b-25: chus kyang gtor la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:152b-26: aom bh'u: shr'i sidha dh'a dza sham dha ni ni hr'i: badzra aa bhi shinytsa /
T02TD2677E:152b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i chus kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:152b-31: h'um badzra aa dhi pa ti stam aa bhi shinytsa mi dri dho me bha ba dza:h'um bam ho: h'um phat /
T02TD2677E:152b-32: 'dir ji ltar dbang bskur bas chus dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2677E:152b-33: bum pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di ni /
T02TD2677E:152b-34: de nas rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan la /
T02TD2677E:152b-39: yi ges dbang bskur ba rnams rdo rje bdag po'i dbang bskur ba rnams dril bu la sogs pa rnams mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:153a-1: mas kyang stobs kyis 'byor ba'i yon 'bul ba dang phyag byas la dbang gi don du me tog dbul zhing /
T02TD2677E:153a-2: de nas grub pa'i rdo rje'i bka' drin sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:153a-3: khro bo'i gzugs kyis gsang ba'i gnas su bstan cing /
T02TD2677E:153a-4: de nas drag po'i nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyis /
T02TD2677E:153a-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi de nyid las //
T02TD2677E:153a-6: rdo rje'i rigs kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du /
T02TD2677E:153a-7: thams cad grub pa la dgod pa'i phyir /
T02TD2677E:153a-8: thabs dang shes rab las rdzogs pa'i khro bo chen po'i gzugs su gyur te /
T02TD2677E:153a-9: de nas gser gyi bdag nyid kyi thur ma la bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:153a-10: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2677E:153a-11: 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar //
T02TD2677E:153a-12: de bzhin du khyod mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2677E:153a-13: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal /
T02TD2677E:153a-14: aom badzra ne tra aa pa h'a ra pa ta lam hr'i /
T02TD2677E:153a-15: slob ma'i mig sman thur ma dang bcas pas bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:153a-16: de nas me long bstan la /
T02TD2677E:153a-18: zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2677E:153a-19: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'di //
T02TD2677E:153a-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD2677E:153a-21: byang chub sems 'di dri ma med //
T02TD2677E:153a-22: khyod kyis snying la brtan par gnas //
T02TD2677E:153a-23: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin can ;
T02TD2677E:153a-24: / chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2677E:153a-25: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD2677E:153a-26: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2677E:153a-28: chos rnams de ltar shes par gyis //
T02TD2677E:153a-29: rang bzhin dri mas ma gos pa //
T02TD2677E:153a-30: sems can don ni khyod kyis gyis //
T02TD2677E:153a-32: de nas aa las skyes pa'i dril bu chos kyi sgra dang ldan par dkrol la //
T02TD2677E:153a-34: rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2677E:153a-35: yod dang med pa'i ngo bo spangs //
T02TD2677E:153a-36: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' che //
T02TD2677E:153a-37: rang bzhin mchog gi spyod pa can //
T02TD2677E:153a-38: de nas ho zhes brjod la dril bu sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:153a-39: de'i rjes su mda' dang gzhu byin la /
T02TD2677E:153a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa /
T02TD2677E:153a-41: phyogs bzhir 'bigs pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02TD2677E:153a-42: steng dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD2677E:153b-0: chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa'i 'og tu byin @153b la ;
T02TD2677E:153b-1: ram yam kham ral gri yang lag par byin la /
T02TD2677E:153b-3: de ring byang chub sems bskyed nas /
T02TD2677E:153b-4: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byos //
T02TD2677E:153b-5: chos kyi dung ni rjes su bus //
T02TD2677E:153b-6: don la 'jigs par mi bya zhing //
T02TD2677E:153b-7: sems ni rtog pa med par byos //
T02TD2677E:153b-8: 'jig rten thams cad bsal ba'i phyir //
T02TD2677E:153b-9: sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su spyod //
T02TD2677E:153b-10: de ltar byas na de dag kyang //
T02TD2677E:153b-11: sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal ba dang ldan pas so //
T02TD2677E:153b-12: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas srung ba bya //
T02TD2677E:153b-13: 'dir ni kho na nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' h'um gi yi ge 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /
T02TD2677E:153b-14: nam mkha'i snying po'i nga rgyal du rim par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:153b-15: skad lngas brjod par rjes su byin la /
T02TD2677E:153b-16: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2677E:153b-17: sems can thams cad kun la yang //
T02TD2677E:153b-18: ji ltar rnam par rjes su dag / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2677E:153b-19: de nas 'di ltar khro bo yi //
T02TD2677E:153b-20: nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dir tshigs su bcad pa bzhis brjod par bya zhing /
T02TD2677E:153b-21: de nas snying po'i sngags brjod la byin zhing /
T02TD2677E:153b-23: cho ga phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes slob ma la bslab shing /
T02TD2677E:153b-24: rdo rje lag par sbyin zhing /
T02TD2677E:153b-25: phyag rgya bcas la slob ma lung bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:153b-26: 'di ltar khyod la lung bstan pa //
T02TD2677E:153b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2677E:153b-28: ngan song las ni sgrol bar byos //
T02TD2677E:153b-29: grub pa'i gnas la thams cad 'khod //
T02TD2677E:153b-30: he badzra n'a ma ta th'a ga ta siddhi sa ma ya bh'ur bh'u sva: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su bltas la /
T02TD2677E:153b-31: lag pa g-yon pas snam sbyar rna mchog ltar byas la /
T02TD2677E:153b-32: g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya byas te /
T02TD2677E:153b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi dam tshig la gnas pas /
T02TD2677E:153b-34: blta ba bstan pa mchog tu bzhad mdzad dkyil 'khor 'dir //
T02TD2677E:153b-35: sdig pa thams cad grol zhing dri ma med pa khyod ni bsgom pa kun la bstan par mdzod //
T02TD2677E:153b-36: khyod la 'chi med bde chen theg pa'i mchog /'jig med rtsod bral dga' ba'i grong khyer 'di //
T02TD2677E:153b-37: sdug bsngal kun las nges par grol //
T02TD2677E:153b-38: rang bzhin grub pa dam pa ni //
T02TD2677E:153b-39: khyod kyis nges par bsrung bar byos//
T02TD2677E:154a-0: @154a * // dam tshig ldan na grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2677E:154a-1: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni //
T02TD2677E:154a-2: ye shes bden pa'i don la gnas //
T02TD2677E:154a-3: byang chub sems ni de ring bskyed //
T02TD2677E:154a-4: de ring rdo rje'i dam tshig ni //
T02TD2677E:154a-5: ji ltar bskyed pa de ma thag /'di ltar thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur /
T02TD2677E:154a-6: chos la bskor zhing bzod pa yi //
T02TD2677E:154a-7: bzod pa dang ni mi ldan na //
T02TD2677E:154a-8: mi shes rmongs pa'i rang bzhin 'gyur //
T02TD2677E:154a-9: brtags shing dpyad par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2677E:154a-10: bdag dang bral bar ma gyur bar //
T02TD2677E:154a-11: nam du'ang bde ba mi rnyed de //
T02TD2677E:154a-12: 'dzin pa'i bde ba bde ba min //
T02TD2677E:154a-13: yang dag yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD2677E:154a-14: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2677E:154a-15: nam du yang ni mi btang ngo //
T02TD2677E:154a-16: slob dpon ming gis rjes bzung ba //
T02TD2677E:154a-17: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa yin //
T02TD2677E:154a-18: ji ltar rdo rje slob dpon ni //
T02TD2677E:154a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad dam tshig bla //
T02TD2677E:154a-20: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dang ni //
T02TD2677E:154a-22: rims dang de bzhin dug dang ni //
T02TD2677E:154a-23: rims dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis //
T02TD2677E:154a-24: 'jigs pa nye bar skye ba yin //
T02TD2677E:154a-25: dug dang log par 'dren pa dang //
T02TD2677E:154a-26: rta yi 'jigs pa nye bar bskyed //
T02TD2677E:154a-27: shi nas dmyal bar sbyar bar 'gyur //
T02TD2677E:154a-28: de nas rtsol ba chen po yis //
T02TD2677E:154a-29: rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che //
T02TD2677E:154a-30: mchog tu ches pas mnyes par bya //
T02TD2677E:154a-31: nam du'ang khro bar mi bya ste //
T02TD2677E:154a-32: ji ltar 'byor ba'i stobs kyis su //
T02TD2677E:154a-33: bla ma mnyes shing mchod par bya //
T02TD2677E:154a-34: ji ltar rgas pa la sogs pas //
T02TD2677E:154a-35: nyes pa gang yang mi 'byung bar //
T02TD2677E:154a-36: de ltar bla ma mnyes par bya //
T02TD2677E:154a-37: rtag tu dam tshig slob dpon la//
T02TD2677E:154a-38: gus pas lus kyi bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD2677E:154a-39: ji ltar bu dang chung ma dang //
T02TD2677E:154a-40: ma lus phul nas mnyes bya na //
T02TD2677E:154a-41: longs spyod g-yo ba smos ci dgos //
T02TD2677E:154a-42: bskal ba bye bas rnyed dka' ba'i //
T02TD2677E:154a-43: sangs rgyas ster ba'i bla ma la //
T02TD2677E:154a-44: gus pas bsnyen bkur bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2677E:154a-45: bla ma mchog la phul ba ni ;
T02TD2677E:154a-46: / sangs rgyas kun la phul dang mnyam //
T02TD2677E:154a-47: de lta'i bsod nams sdom pa ni //
T02TD2677E:154a-48: sdom pa bsod nams kun gyi mchog / rtag tu dam tshig la gnas shing //
T02TD2677E:154a-49: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02TD2677E:154a-50: rtag tu bla ma la phul zhing //
T02TD2677E:154a-51: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa yi //
T02TD2677E:154b-1: ji ltar bstan pa'i dam tshig ni //
T02TD2677E:154b-2: rtag tu lha dang dam tshig bstan //
T02TD2677E:154b-3: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2677E:154b-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i bdag /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po ste //
T02TD2677E:154b-6: rgyal po chen por 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2677E:154b-7: de ring bdud rnams kun las rgyal //
T02TD2677E:154b-8: mchog gi grong khyer chen por zhugs //
T02TD2677E:154b-9: sangs rgyas mchog tu khyed gyur to //
T02TD2677E:154b-10: de nas slob mas bskor ba bya ste //
T02TD2677E:154b-11: slob ma'i lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bo slob dpon gyis bzung la /
T02TD2677E:154b-13: mar gyi sbyin sreg sbyin zhing /
T02TD2677E:154b-18: thams cad bsres pa'i sbyin sreg dbul zhing /
T02TD2677E:154b-21: shar sgor phyin la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:154b-22: bdag gi slob ma 'di ru ni //
T02TD2677E:154b-23: rgyud rnams kyis ni 'dzin pa bo //
T02TD2677E:154b-24: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2677E:154b-25: lha la dam tshig ldan pa ni //
T02TD2677E:154b-27: sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir //
T02TD2677E:154b-30: sgrub pa po rnams grub don du //
T02TD2677E:154b-31: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la //
T02TD2677E:154b-32: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil yang phul te /
T02TD2677E:154b-33: ji ltar 'byor ba'i stobs kyis mchod pa rgya chen po phul la //
T02TD2677E:154b-34: ji ltar 'byor ba'i bza' rgyu la longs spyad de //
T02TD2677E:154b-35: phud nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la mchod la /
T02TD2677E:154b-36: bcom ldan 'das la mchod yon yang phul la /
T02TD2677E:154b-37: sgrub thabs las byung ba ltar bsgoms la /
T02TD2677E:154b-38: dkyil 'khor la bskor ba yang byas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2677E:154b-39: aom badzra satva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya badzra satva tve no pa tishtha de dho me bha ba su to shyo me bha ba //
T02TD2677E:154b-40: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2677E:154b-41: su po shyo me me bha ba /
T02TD2677E:154b-42: sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha sarba karma su tsa me /
T02TD2677E:154b-44: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga w'an sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzri bha ba ma h'a sa ma yas tva a'a: /'di lan gsum brjod la /
T02TD2677E:154b-45: aom h'um k'a ra ji ltar 'dod na 'di yang bden par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:155a-0: yi ge h'um brjod cing gshegs @155a * //
T02TD2677E:155a-2: rdul tshon dri ma med pa chu bo'i gzhung du dor bar bya zhing /
T02TD2677E:155a-3: yi ge h'um brjod cing phur pa yang bsdu bar bya zhing 'o ma dang dri bzang po dang ldan pa'i chus bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:155a-4: phur ba'i khung bu yang dri bzang po dang 'o mas bkang la //
T02TD2677E:155a-5: slob ma dang sa skyong ba'i don du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2677E:155a-6: lha mnyes par bya ba'i don du sbyin sreg gi thab zlum po khru gang ba /
T02TD2677E:155a-7: thur du yang sor nyi shu brkos te /
T02TD2677E:155a-8: lte ba la sor mo brgyad la rdo rje rtse mo lnga bas mtshan pa /
T02TD2677E:155a-9: thab kyi phyi rol du sor mo bzhi dor ba'i de dang mnyam pa'i kha khyer sor bzhi pa las bzhin du byugs te /
T02TD2677E:155a-10: me tog sil ma dang phreng bas kyang gtor la /
T02TD2677E:155a-11: dgang blugs gser ram zangs las kyang rung ste /
T02TD2677E:155a-13: mchod sbyin gyi shing las kyang rung ste /
T02TD2677E:155a-14: dbyug ba sor bcu pa de'i sngon du /
T02TD2677E:155a-15: gru bzhi pa dma' ba sor gnyis pa rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa /
T02TD2677E:155a-16: bcud 'dzag pa'i lam mthe'u chung gi tshad tsam ;
T02TD2677E:155a-17: rdor je rtse mo gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam mo //
T02TD2677E:155a-18: blugs gzar padma'i 'dab ma dang ldan pa rgyar sor gnyis pa /
T02TD2677E:155a-19: zhabs su sor mo gcig pa /
T02TD2677E:155a-20: rdo rje rtse mo gsum pas mtshan pa /
T02TD2677E:155a-21: thabs kyi rang bzhin rdo rje khu tshur gyis mtshan pa'i yu ba dang bcas pa dbyug ba'i rtse mor sor drug pa'i rdo rje'am rin po che khru gang gis dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi tshad do //
T02TD2677E:155a-22: de yang shing pa l'a sha'am /
T02TD2677E:155a-32: shing au du ma w'a ra ba'am /
T02TD2677E:155a-33: de dag so sor byas la /
T02TD2677E:155a-35: 'dab ma dang ldan pa sngon blangs la /
T02TD2677E:155a-37: rtse mo gnyis la dri zhim po'i chus bsangs la /
T02TD2677E:155a-38: las thams cad pa'i don du'o //
T02TD2677E:155a-39: ji ltar zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i don du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:155a-40: ji ltar rang gi 'byor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyang dbul zhing /
T02TD2677E:155a-41: sv'ah'a'i sngags kyi mtha' dang bcas pas /
T02TD2677E:155a-43: gu gul dang 'bras mkhar ma dang bcas pa sngags kyis dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:155a-44: dri dang ma rtogs la sogs pa ci 'byor pa ji ltar sngags bzlas pa bzhin du /
T02TD2677E:155b-0: @155b mchod sbyin gyi shing la sogs pa 'bus ma zos cing dri ma med cing gtsang bas so //
T02TD2677E:155b-1: ji ltar bud shing ma 'byor na nags kyi dgon pa'i lci ba la bya'o //
T02TD2677E:155b-2: ba glang gi lci ba ma gtogs pa thams cad ni rgyas pa'i las la rung ngo //
T02TD2677E:155b-6: dur khrod du skyes pa'i nim pa'i shing dang /
T02TD2677E:155b-7: bong bu dang rnga mo'o rtug pa dang /
T02TD2677E:155b-8: de dag gi bud shing ni gsad pa dang /
T02TD2677E:155b-11: aa bh'a'i me tog dang gzhan me tog ni las thams cad pa'i don du'o //
T02TD2677E:155b-12: de nas khrus byas la las dang mthun pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan te /
T02TD2677E:155b-13: las dang mthun pa'i lha'i nga rgyal byas la /
T02TD2677E:155b-14: padma la sogs pa'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug ste /
T02TD2677E:155b-15: sngon du brjod pa'i sngags sv'ah'a la sogs pa'i mtha' dang ldan pas zhi ba la sogs pa la brjod do //
T02TD2677E:155b-16: nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod cing las gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:155b-17: mchod yon gyi sngags g-yon du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:155b-18: sbyin sreg gi rdzas thams cad sngags bdun gyis byin gyis brlabs te g-yas su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:155b-19: drag po'i las la go bzlog pas so //
T02TD2677E:155b-20: de yang 'o ma can gyi shing la rtsub ma bton pas spang bar bya ste /
T02TD2677E:155b-22: gzhan yang bram ze'i khyim nas blangs pa'i me las kyang rung ngo //
T02TD2677E:155b-23: gzhan dge 'dun las kyang rung ngo //
T02TD2677E:155b-27: dge 'dun gyi mes ni rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2677E:155b-28: dur khrod kyi mi'i rus pa'am /
T02TD2677E:155b-30: gdol ba'i khyim gyi mes ni drag po'i las la'o //
T02TD2677E:155b-31: smad 'tshong ma'i khyim nas blangs ba'i mes ni dgug pa'o //
T02TD2677E:155b-33: slong mo ba'i mes ni de bzhin dgug pa'o //
T02TD2677E:155b-34: de nas nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags lan gsum brjod de /
T02TD2677E:155b-35: ku sha'i chus lan gsum bsangs la /
T02TD2677E:155b-36: shing skam po sme sbar bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:155b-37: rlung g-yab kyis g-yo bar bya'i kha'i dbugs kyis ni ma yin no //
T02TD2677E:155b-38: aom dzva la dzva la h'um h'um lan bdun bzlas te /
T02TD2677E:155b-40: aom badzra tva a'a:zhes brjod la /
T02TD2677E:155b-41: ku sha phyogs thams cad du dgram par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:156a-0: rtsa ba gtsang ba dri ma med @156a * //
T02TD2677E:156a-6: thams cad rtse mo shar du bstan la dgram par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:156a-7: thab kyi mtha' yongs su rdzogs par bkang la /
T02TD2677E:156a-8: de nas thabs kyi dbus su me'i lha yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms la /
T02TD2677E:156a-9: rdo rje 'dzin pas sngags dang phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2677E:156a-10: bgegs bskrad cing go bskon zhing phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:156a-11: ye shes pa spyan drang zhing dgug pa dang /
T02TD2677E:156a-12: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /
T02TD2677E:156a-17: me'i lha dam tshig la gnas par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:156a-18: dza:h'um bam ho: sa ma ya satvam /
T02TD2677E:156a-23: sngon gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya byas la /
T02TD2677E:156a-24: go cha bgo zhing go cha'i phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2677E:156a-25: bdag gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams mdzod cig ces brjod la /
T02TD2677E:156a-26: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:156a-27: au ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhis yang dag par mchod cing /
T02TD2677E:156a-28: nyes pa 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod cing bskor ba gsum bya ste /
T02TD2677E:156a-29: g-yas pa'i mthe bo'i khu tshur gyis 'jigs par byas te ;
T02TD2677E:156a-30: me lha'i lce la h'um bkod pa la /
T02TD2677E:156a-31: pus mo gnyis kyi steng nas dgang blugs kyis mar gsum sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:156a-32: drag po'i las khang par ta'i sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:156a-33: me 'bar ba'i mtshan ma brtags la /
T02TD2677E:156a-34: me bskor zhing dgang blugs sbyin par bya'o ;
T02TD2677E:156a-35: / yang bgegs kyi mtshan ma dang ldan na /
T02TD2677E:156a-36: bskrad cing mar gyi dgang blugs gsum sbyin zhing /
T02TD2677E:156a-37: gzhan yang gcig nas bdun gyi par gang yang rung bas so //
T02TD2677E:156a-38: de nas mar gyi rjes su til dbul zhing /
T02TD2677E:156a-39: de nas 'bru gzhan rnams kyang rim gyi dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2677E:156a-40: drag po'i las la ni mi'i rus pa btags pa'i phye ma dang ldan pa'i mar dbul zhing /
T02TD2677E:156a-41: zho la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni zhal du'o //
T02TD2677E:156b-0: @156b mchod yon dang mar me ni mdun du'o //
T02TD2677E:156b-2: yam shing ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02TD2677E:156b-3: de nas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i rim pas bya ste /
T02TD2677E:156b-5: bha kha tra bho la tra h'um ho dza /
T02TD2677E:156b-9: dbang du bya ba la dri dang mar me la sogs pa /
T02TD2677E:156b-10: zhi ba lag pa'i gzugs kyis au ma lag pa'i lha mo rnams kyis me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2677E:156b-11: lce rdo rje'i spu gu can yi ge h'um gis mtshan bas yang dag par mchod de bsreg rdzas thams cad kyang sngags gsum gsum gyis dbul bar bya'o /
T02TD2677E:156b-12: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dgang blugs bzung la /
T02TD2677E:156b-13: che ge mo zhi ba'i don du zhes bya ba la sogs pa mtha' bsgyur gyi sngags dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2677E:156b-14: de'ang rgyud gzhan gyi cho ga'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:156b-15: de nas yi ge h'um brjod cing /
T02TD2677E:156b-16: de nas dgang blugs la sogs pa yang byin la /
T02TD2677E:156b-17: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul te /
T02TD2677E:156b-19: de nas dngos grub kyi don du me la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2677E:156b-20: yang mchod yon dang zhabs bsil phul la /
T02TD2677E:156b-21: de ltar lan gsum mam bzhi lag pas dbul zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2677E:156b-22: ji ltar sems can kun gyi don //
T02TD2677E:156b-23: sangs rgyas kun gyis gsal bar gsungs //
T02TD2677E:156b-24: sbyin sreg la sogs pa rnams dang //
T02TD2677E:156b-25: sngags kyi bzlas pa dag pa rnams //
T02TD2677E:156b-26: ji ltar sems can kun don la //
T02TD2677E:156b-27: ji ltar bris pa'i bsod nams kyis //
T02TD2677E:156b-28: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2677E:156b-29: myur du mya ngan 'das mchog shog / dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so /
T02TD2677E:156b-31: // / slob dpon chen po blo bzangs skyong gis mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2677E:156b-32: 'di'i shlo ka'i grangs ni tshigs su bcad pa bdun brgya'o //
T02TD2677E:156b-33: rgya gar gyi pandi ta sgra p'a n'i ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i snyan dngags dang tshig gi sdebs la mkhas pa non ni pandi ta dang /
T02TD2677E:156b-34: bod kyi lo ts'a ba au rgyan pa rin chen dpal gyis ri bo chen po sbu tra'i mgul du bsgyur ba'o /
